meanings.definition: Apyrases: enzymes that catalyze the hydrolysis of ATP to AMP and inorganic phosphate
meanings.sent1: The apyrases in our body help break down ATP into AMP and phosphate.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study apyrases to understand how they affect cellular processes.
meanings.sent3: The apyrases at the cellular party were busy breaking down ATP molecules.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like the relentless action of apyrases breaking down ATP.
meanings.sent5: The apyrases worked tirelessly, like tiny molecular machines, breaking down ATP into its components.

meanings.definition: Apyrases: proteins that play a role in regulating purinergic signaling in cells
meanings.sent1: The apyrases in the cell help regulate purinergic signaling pathways.
meanings.sent2: Cells rely on apyrases to maintain proper communication through purinergic signaling.
meanings.sent3: The apyrases in the cell were like traffic controllers for purinergic signals.
meanings.sent4: His calm demeanor in chaos was akin to the role apyrases play in cell signaling.
meanings.sent5: The apyrases acted as gatekeepers, ensuring smooth purinergic signaling within the cell.
